name: Straight Away to Orion
tagline: a visualization of exoplanetary systems as small multiples and in 3D
body:
# Findings

### Astronomers Discover New Planets, 3 Are Habitable (Gliese 667 C)
* report: http://www.foxnews.com/science/2013/06/25/astronomers-discover-new-planets-3-are-habitable/

### Astronomers Discover New Earth-Sized Exoplanet (Kepler-78b)
* research paper: http://arxiv.org/abs/1305.4180
* info: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kepler-78b
* report: http://www.sci-news.com/astronomy/science-new-earth-sized-exoplanet-kepler78b-01324.html

### Richest Planetary System Discovered (HD 10180)
* research paper: http://www.eso.org/public/archives/releases/sciencepapers/eso1035/eso1035.pdf
* report: http://www.eso.org/public/news/eso1035/
* report: http://www.eso.org/public/science/top10/

### Most Earth-Like ExoPlanet Possibly Found (Kepler-69c)
* info of system: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kepler-69
* info of planet: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kepler-69c
* report: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Discoveries_of_extrasolar_planets#2013
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
